sentences.en: A shunt ammeter can be modeled as a voltmeter with a resistor across the input.
sentences.cn: 分流型安培计可以看成是在其输入端跨接了电阻器的电压表。

sentences.en: A voltammeter is consisted of a voltmeter and an ammeter.
sentences.cn: 伏安计是由伏特表和安培表组成的.

sentences.en: All the current flowing in the circuit must pass through the ammeter.
sentences.cn: 所有流过电路的电流必须流过电流表.

sentences.en: Also, the resistor limits the AC gain of the feedback ammeter.
sentences.cn: 此外, 该电阻器还限制回馈安培表的交流增益.

sentences.en: Ammeter, voltmeter, bridge and similar common methods are typical equipment types.
sentences.cn: 电流表 、 电压表 、 电桥以及类似的常见仪器都属于常用的设备.

sentences.en: B - Intelligent Power Measurement voltmeter, ammeter, and more detailed kinetic measurement table code!
sentences.cn: 智能电力测量电压表, 电流表, 多动能测量表程序代码详细!

sentences.en: B - Intelligent Power Measurement voltmeter, ammeter, and more kinetic energy measurement table code?
sentences.cn: 智能电力测量电压表, 电流表, 多动能测量表程序代码?

sentences.en: Be able to operate multimeter , pressure - gauge , ammeter, and other related measuring equipment.
sentences.cn: 能够使用万用表, 电表等其他测量仪器.

sentences.en: Do not use ammeter in circuits with more than 32 V present.
sentences.cn: 不得在电压不要超过32V的电路上测试电流.

sentences.en: He was very attentive to the ammeter.
sentences.cn: 他十分经心在意地望着电流计.

sentences.en: If the component or material breaks down, all the voltage would be applied to the ammeter's input, possibly destroying it.
sentences.cn: 如果元件或材料发生击穿，全部电压都会加到安培计的输入端，从而可能将其损坏。

sentences.en: Make sure that the dc ammeter indication increases approximately 5 amperes.
sentences.cn: 确保直流电流表指示升高大约5安培.

sentences.en: The effects of input capacitance on current measurements using a shunt type ammeter (Figure 2-49) are similar to those for voltage measurements.
sentences.cn: 使用分流型安培计（图2-49）时，输入电容对电流测量的影响与电压测量时类似。

sentences.en: The framework and realization of a multi - user ammeter system is introduced.
sentences.cn: 介绍了一种 多用户 用电抄表系统的结构与实现.

sentences.en: The measuring range ammeter can be made by user's.
sentences.cn: 电流表量程由用户指定.

sentences.en: The most basic instruments include an ammeter, voltmeter, and ohmmeter . 2.
sentences.cn: 最基本的仪器包括安培表, 电压表和电阻表.

sentences.en: They are widely used in Camera, ammeter , flashlight and other devices.
sentences.cn: 工业包装广泛适用于摄像机 、 电表、照相机 、 手电筒、智能安防系统等.
那个电表上的度数是 多少 ?

trans.tran_en: a piece of equipment used to measure the strength of an electric current
